snippet: Nickelodeon held an open call for new cartoon ideas at Comic-Con and will turn the proposal for “Cupcakery of Doom,” pitched by a 28-year-old journalist, into an animated short.
lead_paragraph: Nickelodeon held an open call for new cartoon ideas at Comic-Con and will turn the proposal for “Cupcakery of Doom,” pitched by a 28-year-old journalist, into an animated short.

headline.main: Nickelodeon Cartoon Pitches at Comic-Con Turn Up a Winner
